attributes.action: Make the bus travel pass uk wide
attributes.additional_details: I am a uk citizen I pay uk tax and I feel that the uk government should do all it can to make everyone feel a part of the big picture and remove this divisive barrier that the separatists gloat over
attributes.background: I have a Scottish bus pass I am English and retired to Scotland and I have to pay to use buses in England where I worked all my life

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635766
